#summary Installation
#labels framework,asp

KAF is intalled in five steps:
1.	Download the KAF package from http://code.google.com/p/kissaspframework/
2.	Unzip the package
3.	Open the entrance file such as index.asp with a text editor and include the Kiss/Config.asp file to your entrance file.
4.	Set your application constants.
5.	Set your database settings.

In your application folder must include three folders, Controller, Model and View.

That it!
